articles.title: Healthy babies born in Britain after scientists used DNA from three people to avoid genetic disease - CNN
articles.description: Eight healthy babies were born in Britain with the help of an experimental technique that uses DNA from three people to help mothers avoid passing devastating rare diseases to their children, researchers reported Wednesday.
